verses.verse: So all<WH3605> Israel<WH3478> was enrolled<WH3187> by genealogies;<WH3187> and behold,<WH2009> they are written<WH3789> in the Book<WH5612> of the Kings<WH4428> of Israel.<WH3478> And Judah<WH3063> was carried<WH1540> away<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> to Babylon<WH894> for their unfaithfulness.<WH4604>

Now the first<WH7223> who<WH834> lived<WH3427> in their possessions<WH272> in their cities<WH5892> [were] Israel,<WH3478> the priests,<WH3548> the Levites<WH3881> and the temple<WH5411> servants.<WH5411>
And some<WH4480> of the sons<WH1121> of Judah,<WH3063> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin,<WH1144> and of the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> and Manasseh<WH4519> lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem: <WH3389>

Uthai<WH5793> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud,<WH5989> the son<WH1121> of Omri,<WH6018> the son<WH1121> of Imri,<WH566> the son<WH1121> of Bani,<WH1137> from the sons<WH1121> of Perez<WH6557> the son<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
And from the Shilonites<WH7888> [were] Asaiah<WH6222> the first-born and his sons.<WH1121>
And from the sons<WH1121> of Zerah<WH2226> [were] Jeuel<WH3262> and their relatives,<WH251> 690 [of them.]
And from the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> [were] Sallu<WH9365> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Hodaviah,<WH1938> the son<WH1121> of Hassenuah,<WH5574>

and Ibneiah<WH2997> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> and Elah<WH425> the son<WH1121> of Uzzi,<WH5813> the son<WH1121> of Michri,<WH4381> and Meshullam<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Shephatiah,<WH8203> the son<WH1121> of Reuel,<WH7467> the son<WH1121> of Ibnijah;<WH2998>
and their relatives<WH251> according to their generations,<WH8435> 956. All<WH3605> these<WH428> [were] heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] according to their fathers' houses.<WH1004>
And from the priests<WH3548> [were] Jedaiah,<WH3048> Jehoiarib,<WH3080> Jachin,<WH3199>

and Azariah<WH5838> the son<WH1121> of Hilkiah,<WH2518> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Zadok,<WH6659> the son<WH1121> of Meraioth,<WH4812> the son<WH1121> of Ahitub,<WH285> the chief<WH5057> officer<WH5057> of the house<WH1004> of God;<WH430>

and Adaiah<WH5718> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Pashhur,<WH6583> the son<WH1121> of Malchijah,<WH4441> and Maasai<WH4640> the son<WH1121> of Adiel,<WH5717> the son<WH1121> of Jahzerah,<WH3170> the son<WH1121> of Meshullam,<WH4918> the son<WH1121> of Meshillemith,<WH4919> the son<WH1121> of Immer;<WH564>
and their relatives,<WH251> heads<WH7218> of their fathers' households,<WH1004> 1760 very able<WH2428> men<WH1368> for the work<WH4399> of the service<WH5656> of the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>
And of the Levites<WH3881> [were] Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Hasshub,<WH2815> the son<WH1121> of Azrikam,<WH5840> the son<WH1121> of Hashabiah,<WH2811> of the sons<WH1121> of Merari;<WH4847>
and Bakbakkar,<WH1230> Heresh<WH2792> and Galal<WH1559> and Mattaniah<WH4983> the son<WH1121> of Mica,<WH4316> the son<WH1121> of Zichri,<WH2147> the son<WH1121> of Asaph,<WH623>

and Obadiah<WH5662> the son<WH1121> of Shemaiah,<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Galal,<WH1559> the son<WH1121> of Jeduthun,<WH3038> and Berechiah<WH1296> the son<WH1121> of Asa,<WH609> the son<WH1121> of Elkanah,<WH511> who lived<WH3427> in the villages<WH9161> of the Netophathites.<WH5200>
Now the gatekeepers<WH7778> [were] Shallum<WH7967> and Akkub<WH6126> and Talmon<WH2929> and Ahiman<WH289> and their relatives<WH251> (Shallum<WH7967> the chief<WH7218>
[being stationed] until<WH5704> now<WH2008> at the king's gate<WH8179> to the east<WH4217>). These<WH1992> [were] the gatekeepers<WH7778> for the camp<WH4264> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi.<WH3878>

And Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Kore,<WH6981> the son<WH1121> of Ebiasaph,<WH43> the son<WH1121> of Korah,<WH7141> and his relatives,<WH251> of his father's house,<WH1004> the Korahites,<WH7145> [were] over<WH5921> the work<WH4399> of the service,<WH5656> keepers<WH8104> of the thresholds<WH5592> of the tent;<WH168> and their fathers had been over<WH1> the camp<WH5921> of the Lord,<WH4264> keepers<WH3068> of the entrance.<WH8104>
And Phinehas<WH6372> the son<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> was ruler<WH5057> over<WH5921> them previously,<WH6440> [and] the Lord<WH3068> was with him.
Zechariah<WH2148> the son<WH1121> of Meshelemiah<WH4920> was gatekeeper<WH7778> of the entrance<WH6607> of the tent<WH168> of meeting.<WH4150>

All<WH3605> these who were chosen<WH1305> to be gatekeepers<WH7778> in the thresholds<WH5592> were 212. These<WH1992> were enrolled<WH3187> by genealogy<WH3187> in their villages,<WH9161> whom<WH1992> David<WH1732> and Samuel<WH8050> the seer<WH9536> appointed<WH3245> in their office of trust.<WH530>
So they and their sons<WH1121> had charge<WH5921> of the gates<WH8179> of the house<WH1004> of the Lord,<WH3068> [even] the house<WH1004> of the tent,<WH168> as guards.<WH4931>
The gatekeepers<WH7778> were on the four<WH702> sides,<WH7307> to the east,<WH4217> west,<WH3220> north,<WH6828> and south.<WH5045>
And their relatives<WH251> in their villages<WH9161> [were] to come<WH935> in every seven<WH7651> days<WH3117> from time<WH6256> to time<WH6256> [to be] with them;

for the four<WH702> chief<WH5057> gatekeepers<WH7778> who<WH1992> [were] Levites,<WH3881> were in an office of trust,<WH530> and were over<WH5921> the chambers<WH3957> and over<WH5921> the treasuries<WH214> in the house<WH1004> of God.<WH430>

And they spent<WH3885> the night<WH3885> around<WH5439> the house<WH1004> of God,<WH430> because<WH3588> the watch<WH4931> was committed<WH5921> to them; and they [were] in charge<WH5921> of opening<WH4668> [it] morning<WH1242> by morning.<WH1242>
Now some<WH4480> of them had charge<WH5921> of the utensils<WH3627> of service,<WH5656> for they counted<WH4557> them when they brought<WH935> them in and when they took<WH3318> them out.

Some<WH4480> of them also were appointed<WH4487> over<WH5921> the furniture<WH3627> and over<WH5921> all<WH3605> the utensils<WH3627> of the sanctuary<WH6944> and over<WH5921> the fine<WH5560> flour<WH5560> and the wine<WH3196> and the oil<WH8081> and the frankincense<WH3828> and the spices.<WH1314>
And some<WH4480> of the sons<WH1121> of the priests<WH3548> prepared<WH7543> the mixing<WH4842> of the spices.<WH1314>

And Mattithiah,<WH4993> one of the Levites,<WH3881> who<WH1931> was the first-born of Shallum<WH7967> the Korahite,<WH7145> had the responsibility<WH530> over<WH5921> the things<WH4639> which were baked<WH2281> in pans.<WH2281>
And some<WH4480> of their relatives<WH251> of the sons<WH1121> of the Kohathites<WH6956> [were] over<WH5921> the showbread<WH3899> <WH4635> to prepare<WH3559> it every<WH7676> sabbath.<WH7676>

Now these<WH428> are the singers,<WH7891> heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] of the Levites,<WH3881> [who lived] in the chambers<WH3957> [of the temple] free<WH6362> [from other service;] for they were engaged<WH5921> in their work<WH4399> day<WH3119> and night.<WH3915>
These<WH428> were heads<WH7218> of fathers' [households] of the Levites<WH3881> according to their generations,<WH8435> chief<WH7218> men,<WH7218> who<WH428> lived<WH3427> in Jerusalem.<WH3389>
And in Gibeon<WH1391> Jeiel<WH3262> the father of Gibeon<WH1> lived,<WH1391> and his wife's name<WH3427> was Maacah,<WH8034>
and his first-born son<WH1121> [was] Abdon,<WH5658> then Zur,<WH6698> Kish,<WH7027> Baal,<WH9058> Ner,<WH5369> Nadab,<WH5070>
Gedor,<WH1446> Ahio,<WH283> Zechariah,<WH2148> and Mikloth.<WH4732>

And Mikloth<WH4732> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Shimeam.<WH8043> And they also<WH637> lived<WH3427> with their relatives<WH251> in Jerusalem<WH3389> opposite<WH5048> their [other] relatives.<WH251>

And Ner<WH5369> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Kish,<WH7027> and Kish<WH7027> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Saul,<WH7586> and Saul<WH7586> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jonathan,<WH3083> Malchi-shua, Abinadab,<WH41> and Eshbaal.<WH792>
And the son<WH1121> of Jonathan<WH3083> [was] Merib-baal; and Merib-baal became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Micah.<WH4318>
And the sons<WH1121> of Micah<WH4318> [were] Pithon,<WH6377> Melech,<WH4429> Tahrea,<WH8475> [and Ahaz.]

And Ahaz<WH271> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Jarah,<WH3294> and Jarah<WH3294> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Alemeth,<WH5964> Azmaveth,<WH5820> and Zimri;<WH2174> and Zimri<WH2174> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Moza,<WH4162>
and Moza<WH4162> became<WH3205> the father<WH3205> of Binea<WH1150> and Rephaiah<WH7509> his son,<WH1121> Eleasah<WH501> his son,<WH1121> Azel<WH682> his son.<WH1121>

And Azel<WH682> had six<WH8337> sons<WH1121> whose names<WH8034> are these:<WH428> Azrikam,<WH5840> Bocheru<WH1074> and Ishmael<WH3458> and Sheariah<WH8187> and Obadiah<WH5662> and Hanan.<WH2605> These<WH428> were the sons<WH1121> of Azel.<WH682>
